author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Al Musmak Museum welcomes visitors on Eid Holiday - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Al Musmak Museum welcomes visitors on Eid Holiday Published
Al Musmak Museum is set to receive the public during Eid Al Adha holiday, from 4:00 PM to 10:00 PM where the museum will provide visual treat on the Kingdom’s unification and its archeological and heritage sites.
Al Musmak Museum is a significant historic destination of Saudi State guests and visitors and tourists of the capital and its residents and students.
Noteworthy, His Royal Highness Prince Sultan bin Salman bin Abdul Aziz, President of SCTH in 2011, had inaugurated the museum’s showcase techniques which were developed under “Museum Development Program” which is carried out by SCTH.
After its upgrading, Al Musmak Museum has become one of advanced museums at the Kingdom’s level and a significant example for modern museums in terms of museum shows as well as incubator of most important memories associated with Kingdom’s emergence and unification.
The public museums across Saudi cities and municipalities are set to receive public during Eid Al Adha in accordance with the directives of HRH the President of SCTH on the importance of engaging the public museums in national and social occasions and tourism activities. To effectuate this, all the museums will be thrown open to public from 4:00 PM to 10:00 PM throughout the Al Adha holiday.
